sourcesContent:
import { useState } from "react"
import {Form, Container} from "react-bootstrap"
import {roomName, roomType, validation} from "../Utils/validation"

function CreateRoom(){

    const [roomDetails, setRoomDetails] = useState({ 
        roomName,
        roomType
        })


    return<>
        <Container>
            <Form.Group>
                <Form.Control id="roomName" type="text" name="roomName" isInvalid={roomDetails["roomName"].inValid} placeholder="Room Name"
                onBlur={(e)=>{setRoomDetails(validation(e.target, roomDetails))}}/>
                {roomDetails["roomName"].errors.map((value,index)=>
                {return <Form.Control.Feedback className="feedback" key={index} type="invalid"> {value} </Form.Control.Feedback>})}
            </Form.Group>

            <Form.Select aria-label="Default select example" name="roomType" onChange={(e)=>setRoomDetails(validation(e.target, roomDetails))}>
                <option value="">Type Room</option>
                <option value="public">public</option>
                <option value="private">private</option>
                {roomDetails["roomType"].errors.map((value,index)=>
                {return <Form.Control.Feedback className="feedback" key={index} type="invalid"> {value} </Form.Control.Feedback>})}
            </Form.Select>

            <InputGroup hasValidation>
            <Form.Control 
                as="select" 
                custom 
                name ="categoryId" 
                isInvalid = {props.product["categoryId"].inValid}
                onChange={(e)=>{props.setProduct(validation(e.target,props.product))}}>
                    <option value="">בחר קטגוריה</option>
                    
                    })}
            </Form.Control>
            {props.product["categoryId"].errors.map((value,index)=>
            {return <Form.Control.Feedback key={index} type="invalid"> {value} </Form.Control.Feedback>})}
        </InputGroup>
        </Container>
    </>
}

export default CreateRoom
